pullRequest.title: Allow using configured S3 credentials with IAM role
pullRequest.bodyText:
Previously, IAM roles could only be used with the default
provider chain (typically, EC2 instance credentials).

nodes.bodyText: You don't need to change this, but Splitter on : limit 2 is much simpler.

commit.message:
Allow using configured S3 credentials with IAM role

Previously, IAM roles could only be used with the default
provider chain (typically, EC2 instance credentials).
